uvi.description:
drm: Fix use-after-free read in drm_getunique()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.44 by commit 491d52e0078860b33b6c14f0a7ac74ca1b603bd6. For more details please see the references link.
